name: named-logs-console
description: console logger using named-logs facade for minimal lib overhead with full control

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && terser lib/esm/index.js -o lib/esm/index.js && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && terser lib/cjs/index.js -o lib/cjs/index.js && tsc -p tsconfig-umd.json && terser lib/umd/index.js -o lib/umd/index.js

author: Ronan Sandford
